entry.title: So-called "Trans Exclusionary Radical Feminism" or "TERF" ideology is most certainly exclusion - and absolutely NOT feminism. On my podcast this week, I answered several listener questions like this one. I really enjoyed making this episode because I got
entry.content: So-called "Trans Exclusionary Radical Feminism" or "TERF" ideology is most certainly exclusion - and absolutely NOT feminism. On my podcast this week, I answered several listener questions like this one. I really enjoyed making this episode because I got to address many of the things that I know drum up quite a bit of controversy and tension. I hope you find it useful - take a listen to DEAR SCHUYLER anywhere you get your podcasts! #dearschuyler #transgender #transpodcast #podcast

entry.title: Anti-trans rhetoric and transphobia hurt everyone. This nonsense has got to stop. Trans people are not the problem. Everyone is debating where trans people belong but so few people are truly educated on transness. Come to a workshop or take one of my trai
entry.content: Anti-trans rhetoric and transphobia hurt everyone. This nonsense has got to stop. Trans people are not the problem. Everyone is debating where trans people belong but so few people are truly educated on transness. Come to a workshop or take one of my trainings: pinkmantaray.com/workshops ğŸ™ğŸ¼ Get engaged and help fight all this anti-trans, misogynistic, racist propaganda! Shirt by @Greyson!! #transgender #transathlete #transathletesbelonginsports #lettranskidsplay #transkids #protecttranskids #womenssports #girlssports #gender #pride #inclusion
